message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible opportunity. This product has the potential to revolutionize the industry and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to let it go for $1500000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you think it's a bit pricey, but I believe the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I see you're getting closer to my initial price, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. I'll meet you at $1200000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer, so I expect you to make a serious decision
